About Me

I'm Myst1cS04p — developer, systems thinker, and prototype alchemist. I thrive in chaos and love bending tech into weird, beautiful shapes. My work blends logic with aesthetics, and I'm always in pursuit of building tools, systems, and digital expressions that punch above their weight.

Whether it’s code, hardware, or pure idea-space, I live for the rapid fire loop of create–test–break–rebuild. If something doesn’t exist yet, I prototype it. And if it does exist, I probably mod it.
